title: The Doom Bots have left the building!

replies.body: Bring Back URF {{item:3060}} {{item:1075}} {{item:1055}}
{{item:1075}} URF!!! URF!!! URF!! URF!! {{item:1055}}  FREEEEDOM IS OURRRRRSSSS!!! URFVOLUTION!!!!
I WANT URF BACK so does braum{{champion:201}}
MUSTA BRING BACK URF {{champion:6}}
^ We need URF ^
URF pls
Bring back URF ASAP. I have a clot in my left leg.
{{champion:33}} ok..
What if I told you evertytime you asked for URF again, it got delayed another week?
Personally, I'd lol.{{champion:222}}
That would be pretty troll.{{champion:48}}

Players: URF Mode
Enemies: Doom Bots!

dude.. that would be boring as hell.. doom bots can be done normaly, beating them with urf mode would be quite easy lol.  urf player vs doom player, as counter other player said, or doom player vs doom player sounds more interesting in my idea.

I felt like Doom Bots didn't have very much replay value after you had faced every bot and it lacked that competitive pvp edge.  

Sure, it was fun going up against something so crazy for a while, but I think this was one of the weaker Featured Game Modes.

Doom bots was anti-fun to be honest . You couldn't fight a bot because , no matter what you did , you were always in disadvantage , so you were forced to : 1.Defend and wait to die 2.Split push all day
i once got fed as vel'koz and i was just as scary as the bots
Vel'koz is a doom bot in playable form .__.

A friend of mine thought of what I thought was an interesting mode. He called It "Regicide" where a random player on each team starts at level 18 and is designated king. But there's a catch, there no towers, and if that player dies, that team loses, which he believes would create two main strategies; Have the whole team defend the king at all times, or have your team raid the enemy king while the your king hides somewhere safe. I honestly don't know how well the mode would function, but I still think it sounds interesting.

I actually do like this idea. there are a couple of things that could go wrong. for instance if its random and your support class gets put at level 18 vs there ADC it creates a unfair advantage. Would be nice to see them work with it though.

Or you just get king Teemo and sit invisible all game.

All hail Satan, lord of Regicide.
Can't we just have a rotation on special game modes every 2 - 5 weeks? That will keep the players busy. It will be a shame to waste all of efforts on these game modes after having them up only once.

A mode where line skill shots have infinite range would be cool
{{champion:101}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:53}}
Awful idea...Blitz spawns in and hooks across the map to pull someone from fountain into his fountain...rinse and repeat, that'd be a terrible game mode.

Why not a horde mode? Only inner turrets around the base, massive amounts of minions attacking with like 10 bots attacking and you have to survive for 10 waves to win. 5 Difficulties, 1 easy bots and minions 5 waves , 2 medium bots minions and siege minions 10 waves, 3 hard bots minions siege minions and super minions 10 waves, 4 doom bots minions siege minions super minions with more health 15 waves, 5 urf doom bots with only super minions 5 waves... 4-8 minute waves 10 second breaks between turrets have less defences but regen health much faster.
